TopicTitle: Clipping through ground [Vessel Falling Through Terrain on Zoom out and Zoom in]

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.3.2 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Win 10 | CPU: r5 5600x | GPU: 3070 | RAM: 32gb

 

I landed a small probe that broke apart into just a OKTO, 2 drogue chutes, and 8 xs solar panels. I zoomed out max (on eve) and when i zoomed back in the vessel started falling through the ground.

 

Edited August 6, 2023 by Anth12
